Question
========
  
In a healthy behavior survey, respondents are asked, among other things, about their weight and what mode of transportation (such as bicycle, ov, car) they typically use when traveling to work or study. Which views are most appropriate to show the distribution of these two variables? 
Answerlist
----------
* Weight with a bar graph and means of transportation with a histogram.
* Weight with a histogram and means of transport with a bar graph.
* Both with a bar graph.
* Both with a histogram.
